t: The Complete Home Decorator: 1000 Design Ideas for the Home: Amazon.co.uk: Walton, Stewart: 9780847818983: Books
s: It's an excellent book showing all aspects of home decor such as painting and laying flooring. But it has some great ideas for room design with lovely photographs. I've used many of the ideas as a starting point for my own decorating. And it taught me to wallpaper!
